greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Interleave n and 1-n.
comment: Partial sums are A097141. Binomial transform is x(1+x)/(1-2x), or A003945 with a leading 0.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,1,1).
formula: G.f.: x*G(0)/(1+x) where G(k) = 1 + 2*x/(1 - x/(x + 2/G(k+1) )); (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 21 2012
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 29 2004
